Texto: 
hard mass in posterior aspect of neck.  no pain or erythema.
excision of mass
• expansile mass arising from the c7 spinous process
osteochondroma
• osteochondroma
• osteoblastoma
• osteosarcoma
• paget disease
• fibrous dysplasia
16 year old boy who presents with progressively enlarging "hump" or mass on the posterior lower neck
